text: The following is a list of the presidents of Fordham University, from its establishment as St. John's College onward. From 1841 to 1846, the university was governed by the Archdiocese of New York, and was placed in the custody of the Society of Jesus thereafter. ==Presidents== ===Archdiocese of New York === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:60%" |- ! style="width:7%;"| Name ! style="width:5%" class="unsortable" | Photo ! style="width:5%;"| Years presided ! style="width:1%;" class="unsortable"| |- | Fr.
